channel.title: What do you do if you can't concentrate?
channel.description:
Well, I was working on my application, and I could not work out why something was occuring which I did not want to. It had me beat, and I was becoming frustrated. I got bored and my parents were not home, so I decided to perform my Ram Muay Wai Khru dance. After that, I came back, relaxed and ended up finding out why.
I then was motivated to come and post this, as I am sure a lot of you go into this position.

item.title: What do you do if you can't concentrate?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

jme:

*Awaits mopmans reply

Haha, you know me too well.

SOMEONE IS WRONG ON THE INTERNETS!?!?!

Read full topic

item.title: What do you do if you can't concentrate?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:30, topic:229766”][quote author=jme link=topic=302357.msg2429695#msg2429695 date=1220797683]
Amphetamines and ritalin will still make you concetrate better if you do not have ADD/ADHD…

20 mg’s of dextroamphetamine is good for that imo… Though 100 mg’s == more fun.

Oh and btw, ADD and ADHD == same thing. There’s just different types of ADHD. Too hard to explain.
*Awaits mopmans reply
[/quote]
ADD = can’t concentrate

ADHD = hyperactive and can’t concentrate[/quote]

Not quite… That whole thing is just a huge misconception.

ADHD == the exact same thing as ADD. They are two names for the same condition. However there are different sub types of ADHD:

ADHD Inattentive = can’t concetrate.
ADHD Hyperactive = hyperactive [and can’t concentrate, though this is not as predominant]

After a quick google search to explain this better, I will quote:

Imagine there is a new disease in San Francisco. The doctors study it and call it “Disease A.” Later that week, in Denver, doctors discover that same disease and not knowing that disease already exists, call it “Disease B.” Everywhere this disease shows up it is called by a different name. No one has made the connection that Disease A is the same thing as Disease B and C and D and etc... One day all the doctors get together at a conference and decide that all these alphabet diseases are the same thing. They call it by one name since twenty names for the same disease is confusing.

It’s a similar story for ADHD. ADD is just one of the names it has had in the past, and it has persisted until today even though it’s not correct.

Fuck you popular usage…

Read full topic
item.source: What do you do if you can't concentrate?

item.title: What do you do if you can't concentrate?
item.dc:creator: @Ckstunnerscape Ckstunner
item.description:
@Ckstunnerscape wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:23, topic:229766”][quote author=Ckstunner link=topic=302357.msg2426868#msg2426868 date=1220657586]
Then take Ritalin
[/quote]Thats if you have ADHD. its kinda different if you don’t.

[quote author=davidude36 link=topic=302357.msg2427949#msg2427949 date=1220701925]
No one has mentioned fap yet.

I do actually fap sometimes and afterwards it usually gives me a clear head if you get what i mean.
[/quote]This made me lol a bit irl because i was wondering why no one mentioned it.

I usually get some powerade or something to drink. And if I still can’t concentrate I just leave and come back 15 minutes later.[/quote]

Thats if you have ADD, Which is Attention Deficit Disorder, I have ADHD, Which is Attention Defict Hyperactivity Disorder, So I take Dextroamphetamine, And if you take Ritalin, It still can help

Read full topic
